title: Technology-Enhanced Collaborative Learning for Digital Literacy Competency Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning course for in-service science professionals to enhance digital literacy competencies through short learning modules in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can propose scientific problem-solving approaches utilizing the six core elements of the Digital Literacy Framework (DLF): visual-image, information, reproduction, branching thinking, socio-emotional, and real-time thinking
Learners can perform real-time knowledge sharing and feedback with peers using mobile-based collaboration tools
Learners can design methods to apply new digital tools to scientific tasks through self-directed learning strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
